layman_description: A durable metal axe for chopping wood and hitting zombies.
technical_description: Melee weapon with 25-35 base damage, wooden handle, iron head, 1.2s swing speed.
player_impact: Essential early-game tool for resource gathering and combat before better weapons arrive.

layman_description: Protective headwear made from treated leather hides.
technical_description: Armor piece providing 15 armor protection, 0.8kg weight, leather material, reduces knockback by 10%.
player_impact: Early defensive option that keeps your head safe while you gather resources on the first day.

layman_description: A sealed tin of corn kernels you can eat for nourishment.
technical_description: Consumable item restoring 15 food, 5 health, stamina modifier +0.5, 0.2kg, no spoilage.
player_impact: Reliable food source that doesn't spoil, perfect for stashing in your inventory when fresh food runs out.

layman_description: Standard ammunition round for pistols and submachine guns.
technical_description: Projectile ammo, 22 damage per shot, 0.01kg each, magazine capacity 30, velocity 400m/s.
player_impact: Abundant ammo type that keeps your firearm combat viable without depleting rare resources.

layman_description: Raw ore chunk containing iron that you can smelt into ingots.
technical_description: Ore resource, 0.5kg weight, smelting time 60s, yields 1 iron ingot + slag, requires furnace.
player_impact: Fundamental material for crafting durability-dependent weapons and tools that you rely on constantly.

layman_description: A pointed tool for breaking stone and mining ore deposits.
technical_description: Mining tool, 2.0s swing speed, ore yield +40%, breaks stone in 2-3 hits, wooden handle, 3.5kg.
player_impact: Mandatory tool for accessing stone and ore, directly controlling how fast you can gather building materials.

layman_description: Medicine tablets that reduce pain and restore some health.
technical_description: Medical item restoring 25 health, reduces pain damage by 50% for 5 minutes, 0.05kg, non-stackable.
player_impact: Critical when wounded; lets you continue defending your base or exploring without falling apart from injuries.

layman_description: A powerful spread-shot firearm for close-range zombie elimination.
technical_description: Ranged weapon, 8-pellet spread, 18 damage per pellet, 2.0s reload, 5-round tube magazine, 3.8kg.
player_impact: Elite close-range weapon that clears hordes but drains ammo fast, forcing tough ammunition management decisions.

layman_description: Heavy metal chest protection that significantly reduces incoming damage.
technical_description: Armor slot: chest, 50 armor points, 5.0kg weight, iron material, physical damage reduction 35%.
player_impact: Major defensive upgrade that lets you stand toe-to-toe with tougher zombies without getting shredded instantly.

layman_description: Cut and prepared wood suitable for building structures and crafting.
technical_description: Crafted resource, 0.3kg per plank, 1 log converts to 3 planks, fuel value 200kJ, stackable x999.
player_impact: The absolute foundation of basebuilding; you need thousands of these to create anything structurally sound.

layman_description: Cooked animal meat that provides excellent nutrition and satisfies hunger.
technical_description: Prepared food, restores 40 food, 10 health, 0.25kg, spoilage timer 3 days, cooked quality bonus.
player_impact: High-quality food that fills your belly and heals wounds, but spoils over time so you must eat it strategically.

layman_description: Mechanical tool for repairing and maintaining mechanical devices and vehicles.
technical_description: Repair tool, 0.8kg, repair speed bonus +25%, reduces repair material cost by 15%, durability 500 uses.
player_impact: Keeps vehicles and traps functioning without wasting precious materials on constant full-stack repairs.

layman_description: Precision long-range firearm for accurate shooting at distant targets.
technical_description: Ranged weapon, single-shot, 45 damage, 600m velocity, 4.5s reload, mounted scope support, 3.2kg.
player_impact: Your safety tool for engaging zombies from towers and rooftops without putting yourself in immediate danger.

layman_description: Medical treatment that cures infections and prevents disease from bites.
technical_description: Medical item, cures infection status within 10 seconds, prevents infection for 30 minutes, 0.05kg.
player_impact: Lifesaver when bitten; without it you're forced to abandon infected limbs or slowly die from spread infection.

layman_description: Large cartridge ammunition loaded with pellets for shotgun-style firearms.
technical_description: Projectile ammo, 8 pellets per round, 18 damage per pellet, 0.04kg, magazine capacity 8, specialty ammo.
player_impact: Heavy hitter ammo that limits your ammunition reserves but guarantees close-range zombie elimination.

layman_description: Torn fabric pieces useful for crafting cloth armor and medical supplies.
technical_description: Crafted material, 0.05kg per scrap, obtained from clothing/leather, stackable x999, textile properties.
player_impact: Building block for early armor and bandages; essential for the first week of survival before better materials appear.

layman_description: Protective leggings made from toughened animal leather.
technical_description: Armor slot: legs, 12 armor points, 0.6kg weight, leather material, movement speed penalty -2%.
player_impact: Simple leg protection that improves survivability during exploration while keeping you mobile enough to flee.

layman_description: Baked bread made from ground corn that provides steady nutrition.
technical_description: Prepared food, restores 35 food, 8 health, 0.3kg, spoilage timer 2 days, baking skill bonus +10.
player_impact: Filling comfort food that bridges the gap between canned goods and full meals during the harsh early days.

layman_description: Digging tool for excavating earth and sand in farming or mining operations.
technical_description: Excavation tool, 1.5s swing speed, dirt yield +50%, breaks dirt in 1 hit, 2.0kg, wooden handle.
player_impact: Accelerates underground mining and farm plot creation, multiplying your resource extraction efficiency.

layman_description: Sharp curved blade weapon designed for slashing through obstacles and enemies.
technical_description: Melee weapon, 30-40 base damage, light blade, 0.8s swing speed, 1.2kg weight, +25% vs plants.
player_impact: Balanced weapon for mobile combat, perfectly suited for kiting zombies while your heavy armor-wearing buddies tank damage.
